mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.REPORT_DATE, CASE R.REPORT_STATUS WHEN 1 THEN '미확인' WHEN 2 THEN '삭제' WHEN 3 THEN '반려' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS REPORT_STATUS, B.REVIEW_CONTENT, B.USER_ID, B.BIZ_ID, R.REPORT_REASON FROM REVIEW_REPORT R JOIN BIZ_REVIEW B ON R.REVIEW_NO = B.REVIEW_NO ORDER BY R.REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.REPORT_DATE, CASE R.REPORT_STATUS WHEN 1 THEN '미확인' WHEN 2 THEN '삭제' WHEN 3 THEN '반려' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS REPORT_STATUS, B.REVIEW_CONTENT, B.USER_ID, B.BIZ_ID, R.REPORT_REASON FROM REVIEW_REPORT R JOIN BIZ_REVIEW B ON R.REVIEW_NO = B.REVIEW_NO
WHERE REPORT_REASON LIKE '%'|| #{searchBox} ||'%' WHERE BIZ_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchBox} ||'%' WHERE REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchBox} ||'%'
ORDER BY R.REPORT_DATE DESC
